channel.title: Mod/admin trouble
channel.description: im having trouble with my server i know how to make mods and admins and that u need to compile and they need to be logged out i did all that and i cant make other people mods or admins it just doesnt work can anyone help?

item.title: Mod/admin trouble
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

parker1:

ye thats the trouble i have it never makes a player a admin or a mod so you saying i should keep trying and eventually it should work?

Have them log out, and change their rights according to what you want them to be. You do NOT need to compile, I repeat, you do NOT need to compile. So try to change their rights and tell them to log back in. It should auto save their character file making them a mod/admin.

Read full topic

item.title: Mod/admin trouble
item.dc:creator: @parker1 parker1
item.description:
@parker1 wrote:

ye thats the trouble i have it never makes a player a admin or a mod so you saying i should keep trying and eventually it should work?[quote=“soadfreek409, post:4, topic:95478”][quote author=mopar I link=topic=137975.msg1340983#msg1340983 date=1179597417]
Go to characters double click there name. Change there player rights there.
[/quote]He probably know’s that by reading " i know how to make mods and admins and that u need to compile " that in his message. But, in case you didnt know that, parker1, that is what you do. Sometimes it will want to be stupid and not want to save the playerRights you set you just gotta keep doing it until it does…[/quote]

ye thats the trouble i have it never makes a player a admin or a mod so you saying i should keep trying and eventually it should work?

Read full topic
